email_chain.subject: Freight Quote for Iron Ore Shipment: MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Dear Jane,

I hope this message finds you well. We are pleased to offer a freight quote for the shipment of 50,000MT of Iron Ore from Tubarao to Qingdao on CIF terms. The vessel proposed is MV OCEAN STAR, with a DWT of 180,000 and LOA of 300m.

Our starting quote is USD 25.50 per metric ton. The vessel is available for loading from October 20 to October 25.

Please let us know if this works for you or if you need any further details.

Best regards,
John Doe

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Iron Ore Shipment: MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

Thank you for the prompt response. The rate seems a bit high compared to the current market. Could you consider revising it to USD 23.50 per MT? Additionally, could you confirm the demurrage rate and the loading window?

Best regards,
Jane Smith

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Iron Ore Shipment: MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Dear Jane,

Thank you for your feedback. Considering the current market conditions, we can revise the rate to USD 24.00 per MT. The demurrage rate is USD 15,000 per day, pro rata. The loading window is 72 hours.

Please let us know if this revised rate and terms are acceptable.

Best regards,
John Doe

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Iron Ore Shipment: MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

USD 24.00 per MT sounds reasonable. Can we lock in MV OCEAN STAR with a laycan of October 20-25? Please send over the charter party for review.

Best regards,
Jane Smith

email_chain.subject: Fwd: Charter Party for MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Dear Jane,

Great, I will proceed with the booking. Attached is the charter party for your review. Let me know if you need any adjustments.

Best regards,
John Doe

email_chain.subject: Re: Fwd: Charter Party for MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

The charter party looks good. We will proceed as discussed. Thanks for your help!

Best regards,
Jane Smith
